verses.verse: It <S%H8010>happened,<s%> when Solomon had <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1129>building<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and all <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H2837>desire<s%> which he was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%>
that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> as he had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him at <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> "I have heard your <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and your <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> that you have <S%H2603>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2603>me.<s%> I have made this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> which you have <S%H1129>built,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> there <S%H5769>forever;<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually.<s%>

As for <S%H3212>you,<s%> if you will walk <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1732>me,<s%> as David your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and in <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> and will keep my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%>

then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> according as I <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3772><s%> 'There shall not fail you a <S%H376>man<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

But if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H1121>me,<s%> you or your children, and not <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> but shall go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and worship <S%H7812>them;<s%>

then will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>out<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1004>them;<s%> and this house, which I have made <S%H6942>holy<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> will I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

Though this <S%H1004>house<s%> is so <S%H5945>high,<s%> yet shall everyone who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by it be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Why has Yahweh <S%H6213>done<s%> thus to this <S%H776>land,<s%> and to this <S%H1004>house?<s%>'

and they shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5800><s%> 'Because they forsook <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H5647>them,<s%> and served <S%H3068>them.<s%> Therefore Yahweh has <S%H935>brought<s%> all this evil on <S%H7451>them.<s%>'"

It happened at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>

(now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> had <S%H5375>furnished<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> according to all his <S%H2656>desire<s%>), that <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1551>Galilee.<s%>

<S%H2438>Hiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3474>him;<s%> and they didn't please him.

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "What <S%H5892>cities<s%> are these which you have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H251>me,<s%> my brother?" He <S%H7121>called<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> one hundred <S%H3967>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> of the <S%H4522>levy<s%> which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it for a <S%H7964>portion<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H8481>lower,<s%>
and <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%> and <S%H8412>Tamar<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%>

and all the <S%H4543>storage<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5892>had,<s%> and the cities for his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H2837>that<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> for his pleasure in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

As for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> who were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

their <S%H1121>children<s%> who were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land,<s%> whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were not <S%H3201>able<s%> utterly to <S%H2763>destroy,<s%> of them <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised<s%> a <S%H4522>levy<s%> of <S%H5647>bondservants<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> no <S%H5650>bondservants;<s%> but they were the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and his <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and of his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

These were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> who were over <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> who bore <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H6213>labored<s%> in the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to her <S%H1004>house<s%> which Solomon had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H1129>her:<s%> then he built <S%H4407>Millo.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year,<s%> burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> with <S%H4196>them,<s%> on the altar that was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> So he <S%H7999>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a navy of <S%H590>ships<s%> in Ezion <S%H6100>Geber,<s%> which is beside <S%H359>Eloth,<s%> on the <S%H8193>shore<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

<S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> in the <S%H590>navy<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H582>sailors<s%> who had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from there <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>
